H0.text: Cancers result from uncontrolled cell division.

H1.text: High blood pressure results from uncontrolled cell division.

H2.text: Obesity is what results from uncontrolled cell division.

H3.text: Diabetes results from uncontrolled cell division.

A4.text: Errors that cause cancer are self-amplifying and compounding, for example: A mutation in the error-correcting machinery of a cell might cause that cell and its children to accumulate errors more rapidly.

A5.text: A further mutation in an oncogene might cause the cell to reproduce more rapidly and more frequently than its normal counterparts.
